thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com
thread.title: Crack280

author: Crack280
title: Crack280
text:
We have hired many cars all over the world. Many times in Lanzarote, but we never had such a poor experience as with Goldcar.
Collection was a nightmare with a long wait, partly because of people having to return to the desk to complain about being given the wrong car.
The attitude of the counter staff was poor with a truculent, dismissive attitude when you decline their ridiculously over-priced "options".
On a positive note, the vehicle was fine. However due to the sour-faced attitudes of the counter staff we will never use Goldcar again.
